      • getCurrentFPS

        public int getCurrentFPS()
        Description copied from class: AnimationSprite
        Returns the current animation speed in FPS (frames per second). This value should not exceed the game's update speed (Constants.Window#TARGET_FPS).
        Specified by:
        getCurrentFPS in class AnimationSprite
        Returns:
        The current FPS

      • getTexturePath

        public FilePath getTexturePath()
        Description copied from class: TextureSprite
        This method should be implemented by subclasses to return a FilePath representing the location of the current texture. The file path should be relative to the "resources/assets/textures/" folder.
        Specified by:
        getTexturePath in class TextureSprite
        Returns:
        The texture path of the current image to draw
